title: Marvel Masterworks: The Amazing Spider-Man (Hardcover)
description:
J. Jonah Jameson has Peter Parker pegged as Spider-Man. Doctor Faustus is
set to drive our hero insane. The Molten Man is back. The Punisher is back
in town. And that’s just the warmup for the return of the Green Goblin in
the conclusion of Len Wein’s celebrated AMAZING SPIDER-MAN run! When the
Goblin strikes, all bets are off. Spider-Man’s secret identity, the lives
of Aunt May and Mary Jane — everything is on the line in the five-issue
epic that will have you turning pages like there’s no tomorrow! Also
featuring a team-up with Nova, the first appearance of Rocket Racer, the
return of the crime boss Silvermane, and an Annual adventure with more
spiders than men! Collecting AMAZING SPIDER-MAN (1963) #169-180 and ANNUAL
#11, NOVA (1976) #12, and material from MARVEL TREASURY EDITION #14.
